text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking good with 7 ft @ 13s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SW winds. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your top picks, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 9s WSW with strong 39 mph S winds, making it a poor surf day. The day after continues the trend with 11 ft @ 15s W swell but still blown out by 27 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
